Description: Kirkland/Harvard / Inman Square / Harvard Square area, 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom apartment. A quick, 10-minute walk to the Harvard Square [T] stop. The modern galley kitchen has dishwasher, disposal, electric range, and granite countertops. Includes free in-building laundry and 1 off-street parking space. Rent includes municipal water. Notable features include a dining room, hardwood floors, high ceilings, a living room, a roof deck and storage space. This apartment has a broker fee. Presented by Maven Realty. Reference Number: CAM-12031 (RLNE8174219)
